pages.title: Dimensional Aperture Stabilizer
pages.text: At the heart of the Planar Gateway Nexus, the Dimensional Aperture Stabilizer is a towering cylindrical construct made of void-forged alloy and crystalline panels. Its surface is etched with complex, shifting runes that calibrate and stabilize interdimensional portals.

pages.title: Functions
pages.text: It channels raw, unstable energy from the Rift into a steady stream, synchronizing portal openings with cosmic alignments. In emergencies, it activates defensive protocols, locking portals and redirecting excess energy through the Aetherflow Conduit.
